name: OverDrive Libraries
description: OverDrive is the leading global distributor of eBooks, audiobooks, music and video to libraries, schools and retailers worldwide. The OverDrive APIs allow third party applications to search OverDrive digital media collections and deliver title metadata and availability information for OverDrive library and retail partner sites. We will continue to update this page as we expand the services and features offered through OverDrive APIs.
